sentences.en: ...a slide show.
sentences.cn: …幻灯片放映。

sentences.en: ...the dangerous slide in oil prices.
sentences.cn: …石油价格危险的下跌。

sentences.en: ...two young children playing on a slide.
sentences.cn: …在玩滑梯的两个年幼的孩子。

sentences.en: A light pointer is often useful with a slide projector.
sentences.cn: 光指示器经常与幻灯片放映机一起使用.

sentences.en: a slide show
sentences.cn: 幻灯片放映

sentences.en: Don't let things slide.
sentences.cn: 不要任其自流.

sentences.en: Eric lost his footing and began to slide into the pit.
sentences.cn: 埃里克一脚踩空，开始往坑里滑。

sentences.en: He slid open the door of the glass cabinet.
sentences.cn: 他滑开玻璃柜的门。

sentences.en: I've just let things slide, I'm afraid.
sentences.cn: 恐怕我现在唯有听任事态恶化了.

sentences.en: Instead, sarcomere shortening occurs when the thin filaments'slide " by the thick filaments.
sentences.cn: 此外, 肌节的缩短发生于细肌丝沿粗肌丝“滑行 ” 之际.

sentences.en: Let's slide down this grassy slope.
sentences.cn: 咱们顺着这草坡滑下去吧.

sentences.en: No , Chu - chai , we can't just let things slide!
sentences.cn: 竹斋,一定不能消极!

sentences.en: Papa had let the business slide after Mama's death.
sentences.cn: 妈妈去世后，爸爸无心经营。

sentences.en: She hasn't been feeling well lately and she let the housework slide.
sentences.cn: 她近来一直感到不适,对家务也就随它去了.

sentences.en: The car went into a slide on the ice.
sentences.cn: 汽车在冰上打滑.

sentences.en: The car went into a slide.
sentences.cn: 汽车打起滑来。

sentences.en: The children were having a slide down the icy path.
sentences.cn: 孩子们沿结冰的小道滑动.

sentences.en: The company had let environmental standards slide.
sentences.cn: 这家公司听凭环境标准的不断下降。

sentences.en: The nation was urged to pull together to avoid a slide into complete chaos.
sentences.cn: 对全国上下发出了呼吁，要求大家团结一致，避免陷入完全混乱的局面。

sentences.en: The tides slide on the tidy wide beach and collide each other.
sentences.cn: 海潮在整洁宽阔的海滩上滑行并相互碰撞。

sentences.en: The US dollar continued to slide.
sentences.cn: 美元继续贬值。

sentences.en: We have a slide show every other week.
sentences.cn: 我们每隔一周观看一次幻灯片.

words.tran_cn: 滑动器；滑雪者；会滚动之物
滑动；[电影]幻灯片；滑梯；雪崩
滑动；使滑动；悄悄地迅速放置

phrases.tran_cn: 显微镜载片；显微镜载物片
滑下，往下滑；塌陷；下滑音
滑动闸门，滑动水口；滑门
不知不觉陷入；不知不觉地沾染上

trans.tran_cn: 降低，滑行，幻灯片，载玻片，滑梯，山崩，拉管
trans.tran_en: a large structure with steps leading to the top of a long sloping surface which children can slide down

trans.tran_cn: 滑动，悄悄地溜到，不自觉地陷入…，贬值
trans.tran_en: to move smoothly over a surface while continuing to touch it, or to make something move in this way
to move smoothly over a surface while continuing to touch it, or to make something move in this way

trans.tran_cn: 滑，滑动；悄悄地溜走；不知不觉地陷入
trans.tran_en: to move smoothly over a surface while continuing to touch it, or to make something move in this way
